articles.title: Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Meeting of Political Bureau of C.C., WPK Held under Guidance of Kim Jong Un
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was held on Monday under the guidance of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the WPK and chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK.
					 Attending the meeting were members of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and members and alternate members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 Also present as observers were vice premiers of the Cabinet.
					
					 Upon the authorization by the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK, the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un chaired the meeting.
					
					 The meeting discussed "On the execution of the state budget for Juche 106 (2017) and the state budge for Juche 107 (2018)" to be presented to the Sixth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK.
					
					 A report was made by Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK.
					
					 The Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK examined and ratified the state budget compilation for next year and unanimously adopted a decision for presenting it to the Sixth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly.
					
					 Then, at the meeting Kim Jong Un made a report on the development of the recent situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 In his report he referred to the north-south summit and talks to be held at the "House of Peace" in the south side portion of Panmunjom on April 27. He made a profound analysis and appraisal of the orientation of the development of the north-south relations at present and the prospect of the DPRK-U.S. dialogue and set forth the strategic and tactical issues to be maintained by the WPK including the future policy of international relations and the orientation corresponding to them.
					
					 Then, he pointed out in detail the recent work of the members of the Political Bureau of the C.C., WPK and stressed the need for them to give fuller play to their responsibility and role as the commanding members of revolution.
					
					 He called upon all the fields and units of the state to constantly hold the revolutionary banner of self-reliance, carry out without fail the tasks this year, the third year of carrying out the five-year strategy for national economic development, with all their technological forces and economic potentials and thus make a breakthrough in revitalizing the overall economy.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Visit Kumsusan Palace of Sun
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Deputies who will take part in the Sixth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly Tuesday visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun.
					 They paid tribute to President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il before their statues in the palace.
					
					 At the halls where the great leaders lie in state, the deputies made bows to them.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders the great leaders received are on display and halls that house cars, electric car, boat and train coaches used by them for field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their revolutionary lives.

articles.title: Deputies to SPA Visit Korean Revolution Museum
articles.content:
Deputies to SPA Visit Korean Revolution Museum
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Deputies who will take part in the Sixth Session of the 13th Supreme People's Assembly visited the Korean Revolution Museum Tuesday.
					 They paid tribute to the colored statues of President 
					
					Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in its general review room.
					
					 Being briefed on immortal exploits of Kim Il Sung who built our style socialist system centred on the popular masses on this land, they went round various rooms of the hall dealing with the period of laying the foundations of socialism.
					
					 The deputies also toured the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt Taesong and the Pyongyang Teacher Training College.

articles.title: Delegation of Communist Party of People of Spain Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Communist Party of People of Spain Here
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Communist Party of the People of Spain led by Maria Teresa Pantoja Bargueno, member of the Political Bureau of the party who is secretary of the Anti-imperialist Solidarity, arrived here Tuesday ahead of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Delegation of Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan Here
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Union of Korean Writers and Artists in Japan led by Chairman Kim Jong Su arrived here Tuesday to celebrate the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Delegation of Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia Here
articles.content:
Delegation of Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia Here
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Kimjongilia Association of Mongolia led by Dorjgotov Jargalsaikhan arrived here on Tuesday to take part in the 20th Kimilsungia Festival.

articles.title: Foreign Artistes, Delegations Arrive
articles.content:
Foreign Artistes, Delegations Arrive
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Russian State Academic People's Chorus Named after M. E. Pyatnichki, the Song and Dance Ensemble of the Mongolian Army, an opera singer of Bulgaria, the string quartette of the Chamber Orchestra Alberic Magnard of France, a clarinet soloist of Cuba, a Cyprus musical company, the Flamenco Band of Spain and a Thai jugglery troupe arrived here on Tuesday to take part in the 31st April Spring Friendship Art Festival.
					 A Chelyabinsk Regional government cultural delegation of Russia and the general manager of the State Acrobatic Company of Russia and his party came here on the same day.
					
					 Earlier, arriving was a vocalist of the art troupe of the International United Confederation of Koreans.

articles.title: Foreign Marathoners Depart
articles.content:
Foreign Marathoners Depart
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Marathon players from Morocco, Zimbabwe, Kenya, Ethiopia and Uganda left here for home Tuesday after taking part in the 29th Mangyongdae Prize International Marathon ahead of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Foreign Embassy Officials Visit Ryuwon Footwear Factory
articles.content:
Foreign Embassy Officials Visit Ryuwon Footwear Factory
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Officials in charge of cultural and friendly relations of foreign embassies here visited the Ryuwon Footwear Factory on Tuesday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung and the 6th anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Party and the State.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the factory has turned into an icon producer for good-quality shoes that meet the tastes of the people, the visitors went round integrated production control room, cutting workshop, shoemaking workshop and other parts of the factory.

articles.title: Foreign Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Foreign Diplomats Visit Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Representatives of foreign embassies and international organizations and the military attaches corps here visited Mangyongdae on Tuesday ahead of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the President was born and grew into a revolutionary, spending his childhood in Mangyongdae, the guests went round the historic relics.
					
					 On the same day, diplomatic envoys and representatives of international bodies toured Mangyongdae Revolutionary School and the military attaches corps planted a memorial tree around the President's old home.
					
					 Earlier, the military attaches corps visited the Tower of the Juche Idea and the International Friendship Exhibition House.

articles.title: Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
articles.content:
Workers, Trade Union Members Meet
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Workers and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) met at the Central Hall of Workers Tuesday to celebrate the 6th anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Party and State.
					 Present at the meeting were officials concerned, officials of the GFTUK, workers and trade union members.
					
					 A report was made at the meeting to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers stressed that Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Party and State in April Juche 101(2012) marked a great event of national history that provided a firm guarantee for the accomplishment of the Juche revolution.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Un opened a fresh page in accomplishing the cause of immortalizing the great leaders and led the army and people so that they added eternal luster to the revolutionary careers and immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They called for more dynamically marching towards final victory of socialism under the leadership of the great Party, bearing deep in mind the national pride and honor of holding in high esteem Kim Jong Un as the top leader of the Party and State.

articles.title: Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Art Performance Given by Agricultural Workers
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Agricultural workers and members of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea (UAWK) gave an art performance at the Jangchon Vegetable Cooperative Farm in Sadong District of Pyongyang Tuesday to mark the 6th anniversary of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of the top posts of the Party and state.
					 Put on the stage which began with narration and song "Glory to General Kim Jong Un"  were colorful numbers including real story-telling "The peerlessly great men and Jangchon Farm" and female folk solo "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass".
					
					 Performers praised Kim Jong Un for glorifying the Party and state as the ones of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and ushering in a new golden age of the Juche revolution.
					
					 Serial songs "Cheers of the People" and "O My Motherland Full of Hope" and female folk solo "Song of Big Fish Haul", reflecting the reality of the country bringing about eye-opening changes, added to the atmosphere of the performance.
					
					 Kim Chang Yop, chairman of the Central Committee of the UAWK, officials concerned and union officials and agricultural workers enjoyed the performance.

articles.title: Games between DPRK Hwaebul Team and Hang Yuen Team of Chinese Taipei Held
articles.content:
Games between DPRK Hwaebul Team and Hang Yuen Team of Chinese Taipei Held
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Games of teams belonging to Group I (East Asian region) for the 2018 AFC Cup are going on after they started on March 7.
					 There was the first match between Hwaebul Team and Hang Yuen Team, teams belonging to Group I, at the Kim Il Sung Stadium Tuesday.
					
					 Hwaebul Team beat Hang Yuen Team 6:1.

articles.title: Korean Embroidery with Long Tradition
articles.content:
Korean Embroidery with Long Tradition
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Embroidery has a long tradition in Korea.
					 According to a history book of China, nobles of Puyo (before 7th century B.C.-late 3rd century B.C.) wore embroidered silk clothes when they visited foreign countries.
					
					 This fact proves that silk production and embroidery were developed from ancient times in Korea.
					
					 Korean embroideries artistically reflect noble character of the Korean women who are gentle outwardly but firm inwardly.
					
					 They are well known to many countries, to say nothing of neighboring and European countries, for their high artistic depiction, varied techniques and beauty.
					
					 Now the Korean embroidery has been developed suited to socialist way of life and national aesthetic taste.

articles.title: International Friendship Botanical House
articles.content:
International Friendship Botanical House
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- There is the International Friendship Botanical House at the Central Botanical Garden in Pyongyang, the DPRK.
					 Growing at the house are hundreds of species of plants that heads of state, prominent political activists, organizations for the study of the Juche idea, revolutionary people of various countries and overseas Koreans presented to President Kim Il Sung as gifts.
					
					 Robert G.Mugabe, former president of the Republic of Zimbabwe, presented plants to Kim Il Sung as gifts whenever an opportunity presented itself. Among them are Kigeliaafricana, Callistemonviminalis, Agonisflexuosa and other ornamental plants.
					
					 A former president of the Republic of Madagascar, a former president of the Syrian Arab Republic and other heads of state and prominent figures of various countries presented to Kim Il Sung rare and beautiful plants like Angraecumsesguipedale, Oleaeuropaea and Fagussilvatica.
					
					 People of Poland, Denmark, Bulgaria, Netherlands, Italy and other countries in the five continents and overseas Koreans presented Anthurium andraeanum, Rosaalba 'Celestial', Rhododendron indicum, Camellia japonica, Picea glehnii and other different species of rare plants to him as gifts.
					
					 After visiting the Central Botanical Garden, many foreigners are unanimous in saying that the house is a rare plant exhibition in reverence for the great man and an eternal treasure of humankind.

articles.title: Cheonan Sinking Case Must Be Settled: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Cheonan Sinking Case Must Be Settled: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- There is increasing voice for reinvestigation into the case of sunken warship Cheonan in south Korea.
					 Organizations including the South Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration and figures of various social standings recently formed a preparatory committee for all-people joint social measure council for probe into truth about warship Cheonan case and issued a special statement demanding reinvestigation into the case.
					
					 From March 28, KBS has been airing "60 minute pursuit", a documentary based on a new video captured by a thermo image monitor at the time of the sinking of the warship and CCTV image data, drawing the attention of the public.
					
					 An article demanding reinvestigation for the probe into the truth behind the sunken warship Cheonan case was posted on website of Chongwadae to evoke lively repercussion from the public. In the meantime, an opinion poll turned out that 70 percent of the south Korean citizens does not trust the results of the investigation into the warship Cheonan case. This has prompted increasing demand for "government's" reinvestigation into the case.
					
					 The demand for reinvestigation into the case getting stronger amid mounting atmosphere of national reconciliation and unity proves that the case is one of the biggest stumbling blocks in the way of improving the north-south ties.
					
					 The case was a hideous conspiratorial farce which traitor Lee Myung Bak deliberately cooked up to stamp out the June 15 era by escalating north-south confrontation and to get rid of the serious ruling crisis.
					
					 Soon after the investigation results of the authorities were made public with the "story about torpedo attack by the north" as the core, they were rejected by the south Koreans from all walks of life and the international community, and this has ever since increased all kinds of suspicions for the past eight years.
					
					 The unprecedented modern-day version of the burlesque was used for escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen and the moves for a war against the north and for realizing the ambition for power of the pro-U.S. conservative forces. Such confrontational policies as "May 24 step", a dirty product of the farce, put the north-south relations at total stalemate.
					
					 What matters is that the present authorities, trumpeting about the abolition of conservative evils and improvement of the north-south ties, are still mired in the mysterious Cheonan case.
					
					 They let the military authorities describe a series of suspicions about the case as "something that can not be construed otherwise than the torpedo attack by the north" and held the burlesque called "commemoration of the day of defence of the West Sea", chilling the atmosphere for the improvement of the north-south ties.
					
					 As proven, it is urgent and crucial issue under the present situation to clarify the truth about the sunken warship Cheonan case and root out the stumbling block hindering the improvement of the north-south relations.
					
					 In order to realize all Koreans' desire and wish for national reconciliation and cooperation, it is imperative to settle the Cheonan case which the conservative group of traitors cooked up to derail the north-south relations.
					
					 Truth is bound to be brought to light.
					
					 The south Korean authorities have to respond to the demand of the public with proper attitude.

articles.title: S. Korea: Traitor Lee Myung Bak to Be Tried
articles.content:
S. Korea: Traitor Lee Myung Bak to Be Tried
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Traitor Lee Myung Bak, a top class criminal, was reportedly brought to trial in south Korea on Monday. 
					 The prosecution authorities made public the results of the interim investigation into traitor Lee that day.
					
					 After all, in the wake of ex-"presidents" of south Korea Chun Doo Hwan, Roh Tae Woo and Park Geun Hye, Lee Myung Bak was to face punishment by the people for his unpopular rule and scandals.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Urge U.S. to Apologize for Jeju April 3 Incident
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Urge U.S. to Apologize for Jeju April 3 Incident
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The Bereaved Family Society of Jeju April 3 Victims, the Commemoration Committee for the 70th Anniversary of June April 3 Incident and the All-People Committee to Mark the 70th Anniversary of Jeju April 3 Incident in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on April 7 and denounced the U.S. for masterminding the massacre of Jeju islanders, according to the south Korean internet newspaper Tongil News.
					 The speakers said that the April 3 incident was a massacre of civilians that occurred during the rule by the U.S. military administration.
					
					 They urged the U.S. government to admit the responsibility for the massacre, make an official apology and opt for investigation into the truth about the crimes committed by the then the U.S. military administration and the U.S. military advisory group.
					
					 An open letter addressed to the U.S. government was made public at the press conference.
					
					 The letter said that the April 3 incident was committed at a time when the U.S. military administration and the U.S. military advisory group were exercising their command over the south Korean army, adding that tens of thousands of Jeju islanders met grievous deaths.
					
					 The letter also said that the U.S. military administration mobilized a reconnaissance plane for the scorched-earth operation and actively supported weapons and hardware for the "punitive force".
					
					 At the end of the press conference, the chairman of the bereaved family society launched a sit-in in protest against the U.S. embassy's refusal to accept the open letter.

articles.title: CBS Slaps Park Geun Hye's Arrogant Behavior
articles.content:
CBS Slaps Park Geun Hye's Arrogant Behavior
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- South Korean CBS accused traitor Park Geun Hye, who faced a heavy penalty for her extra-large scandal, of refusing to appear in court on April 6.
					 The court announced on the day that Park was found guilty and imposed a heavy penalty on her, the CBS said, adding:
					
					 Park's refusal is aimed at disguising herself as a "political victim" to bring together forces backing her.

articles.title: U.S. Brutal Suppression of April 3 Uprising Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
U.S. Brutal Suppression of April 3 Uprising Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the People's Party of south Korea on April 3 made public a commentary denouncing the U.S. for its brutal suppression of the April 3 Popular Uprising, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 The commentary said the April 3 Popular Uprising was a resistance of the inhabitants on Jeju Island to reject the establishment of "separate government" in south Korea by the U.S. military administration and establish a national unified state.
					
					 It stressed the need to clearly define the resistance as the April 3 popular resistance on Jeju Island and let the coming generations know the atrocities of the U.S. and the Syngman Rhee regime that killed tens of thousands of innocent people, seeking split.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised by Political Party of Benin
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised by Political Party of Benin
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung, who pioneered the era of independence and dedicated his whole life to the victorious advance of the human cause of independence, will always be alive in the hearts of the progressive peoples as the sun of Juche, stressed the Socialist Party of Benin in a statement on April 2 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Extending warm congratulations to the Korean people significantly celebrating the 106th birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung, the founder of socialist Korea and the eternal President of the DPRK, the statement said:
					
					 The President founded the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army and liberated the country by waging an armed struggle.
					
					 He built a socialist state which is demonstrating its might with independence in politics, self-support in the economy and self-reliance in national defence by leading socialist construction to victory and performed immortal exploits for global independence.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Praised in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Praised in Various Countries
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Seminars on exploits of President Kim Il Sung took place in Egypt, DR Congo, Nigeria, Nepal and Indonesia between March 29 and 31 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 Present at the seminars were personages of various circles and masses in those countries.
					
					 The vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt who is chairman of the Egypt-Korea Friendship Association and other personages of different political parties and organizations of Egypt praised the President's exploits for the building of a socialist state, national reunification and global independence.
					
					 The chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of the DR Congo said that the President is the greatest man who defeated the Japanese imperialists to realize the cause of national liberation and devoted his all to the development of socialist Korea.
					
					 The chairman of the Nigerian Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said that Kim Il Sung passed away but his idea and cause would shine forever as the sun is eternal.
					
					 A congratulatory message to the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar in Nepal.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Successful China Visit Hailed in Italy
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Successful China Visit Hailed in Italy
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- Italian organizations issued statements on April 1 and 4 in congratulation of the respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's successful visit to China.
					 The Italian Committee for the Study of Songun Idea for Independence and Sovereignty said:
					
					 H.E. Kim Jong Un's recent visit to China serves as a historic occasion in putting the friendly relations between the DPRK and China, consolidated for decades, on a fresh high level.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung laid a valuable foundation of the DPRK-China friendship with the preceding Chinese leaders in an armed struggle for liberating Korea from the gangster-like Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 We will as ever extend the positive support to the DPRK government's principled stand to reject the imperialists' aggression moves, defend the country's sovereignty and provide the durable peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Youth Front of the Communist Party of Italy said that Kim Jong Un's China visit is of significance in propelling the traditional DPRK-China friendship and cooperative relations among countries aspiring after justice.
					
					 The Italian Branch of the Korean Friendship Association and the Italy-DPRK Cultural and Friendship Association said in a joint statement that the Chinese party and state leaders warmly welcomed and gave cordial hospitality to Kim Jong Un with the greatest sincerity. This clearly shows his high international prestige, the joint statement added. It noted:
					
					 The DPRK is now demonstrating its might as a powerful country dynamically advancing under the uplifted banner of independence and socialism on the international arena. This proves that the line and policies of the DPRK party and government are very just.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Austria
 Pyongyang, April 10 (KCNA) -- The respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Comrade Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People" was brought out in booklet at a publishing house in Vienna on Mar. 27 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung, the Day of the Sun.
					 The work, published on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the revolutionary exploits performed by the President and leader Kim Jong Il throughout their lives.
					
					 It also indicates tasks to firmly preserve and glorify the idea and exploits of the President and the leader.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige la reunion del Buro Politico del CC del PTC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige la reunion del Buro Politico del CC del PTC
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Bajo la direccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, Presidente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, tuvo lugar el dia 9 la reunion del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC.
					En la ocasion participaron los miembros del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y los miembros y otros suplentes del Buro Politico del CC del PTC.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en calidad de observador los vicepremieres del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					El Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un presidio la reunion por el encargo del Buro Politico del CC del PTC.
					
					La reunion discutio el tema "Sobre el estado de ejecucion de los presupuestos estatales en el 106 (2017) de la Era Juche y los mismos para el 107 (2018) de la Era Juche" que sera presentado al 6o periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					Presento el informe Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros.
					
					El Buro Politico del CC del PTC examino y ratifico la composicion de los presupuestos estatales del ano siguiente y aprobo por unanimidad la resolucion de presentarla al 6o periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema.
					
					Acto seguido, hubo el informe del Maximo Dirigente sobre la evolucion actual de la situacion en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Al referirse en el informe a la Cumbre y las conversaciones Norte-Sur de Corea que se abriran el dia 27 en la "Casa de Paz" de la zona surena de Phanmunjom, analizo y evaluo profundamente el inmediato rumbo de desarrollo de relaciones intercoreanas y las perspectivas del dialogo RPDC-EE.UU. 
					
					Y presento la posterior orientacion de relaciones exteriores y el rumbo de reaccion y otros problemas estrategicos y tacticos que deben acatar el PTC.
					
					Senalo detalladamente el estado de ultimo laboreo de los miembros del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y apunto la necesidad de trabajar con mas responsabilidad y desempeno como miembros directivos de la revolucion.
					
					A continuacion, instruyo que todos los sectores y unidades del Estado deben abrir el arremetedero de activacion en todos los sectores de economia nacional al cumplir sin falta las tareas de lucha de este ano, el tercero de cumplimiento de la estrategia quinquenal para el desarrollo de la economia nacional, manteniendo constantemente la bandera revolucionaria de autoconfianza y movilizando todo su personal tecnico y potencialidades economicas.

articles.title: Diputados a la APS visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
articles.content:
Diputados a la APS visitan el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Los diputados, que participaran en el 6o periodo de sesiones de la XIII Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema, visitaron el dia 10 el Palacio del Sol Kumsusan.
					Los visitantes rindieron tributo a los grandes Lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il ante sus estatuas de pie y en los salones de eternidad donde estan conservados sus cuerpos.
					
					Luego, pasaron revista a las salas de conservacion de las ordenes otorgadas a los lideres antecesores y otras de carros, coche electrico, barco y vagones de tren, usados por ellos hasta el ultimo periodo de sus vidas revolucionarias para las visitas de orientacion en el terreno y viajes al extranjero.

articles.title: Efectuado acto festivo de obreros y gremiales
articles.content:
Efectuado acto festivo de obreros y gremiales
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en la Casa Central de Obreros el acto festivo de obreros y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea con motivo del 6o aniversario de la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un a los cargos supremos del Partido y el Estado.
					En la ocasion participaron los funcionarios interesados y de la FGSC, los obreros y los gremiales.
					
					Hubo el informe y los discursos.
					
					Los oradores apuntaron que el Maximo Dirigente fue elegido en abril del 101 (2012) de la Era Juche a los cargos supremos del Partido y el Estado y este evento de relevancia historica nacional proporciono la garantia de cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					El abrio la nueva pagina de cumplimiento de la causa de eternidad del lider y guio a los militares y habitantes coreanos a glorificar de generacion en generacion las vidas y hazanas revolucionarias del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, recordaron.
					
					Exhortaron a luchar con mas vigor por la victoria final de la causa socialista bajo la direccion del gran Partido teniendo en lo profundo del corazon el orgullo nacional de haber elegido a Kim Jong Un a los puestos cimeros del Partido y el Estado.

articles.title: Trabajadores agricolas celebran la efemeride importante con funcion de festejo
articles.content:
Trabajadores agricolas celebran la efemeride importante con funcion de festejo
Pyongyang, 10 de abril (ACNC) -- En la Granja Cooperativa Especializada en Verduras de Jangchon del capitalino municipio de Sadong tuvo lugar el dia 10 la funcion artistica de los trabajadores agricolas y los miembros de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea por el VI aniversario de la eleccion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un a los cargos supremos del Partido y el Estado.
					 En la funcion empezada con la narracion y cancion "Gloria al General Kim Jong Un", se presentaron diversas piezas como la escena de historia real "Grandes hombres sin iguales y la Granja de Jangchon", el solo femenino folklorico "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol" y la magia "Abundante cosecha de manzanas".
					
					  Los ejecutantes elogiaron las hazanas revolucionarias del Maximo Dirigente quien glorifica el partido y el Estado como los del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y abre la nueva era dorada de la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					  Fomentaron el ambiente festivo las canciones en serie "Jubilo del pueblo", "Mi patria llena de esperanzas" y otras que dejan conocer los cambios maravillosos acontecidos en Corea.
					
					  Disfrutaron la funcion el presidente del Comite Central de la UTAC, Kim Chang Yop, los funcionarios interesados, los de la UTAC y los trabajadores agricolas.
